程序包 org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking

类 AbstractLocker<S extends LockStatus>

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.diskstorage.locking.AbstractLocker<S>
类型参数:
S - An implementation-specific type holding information about a single lock; see ConsistentKeyLockStatus for an example
所有已实现的接口:
Locker
直接已知子类:
ConsistentKeyLocker
public abstract class AbstractLocker<S extends LockStatus>
extends Object
implements Locker
Abstract base class for building lockers. Implements locking between threads using LocalLockMediator but delegates inter-process lock resolution to its subclasses.
另请参阅:
ConsistentKeyLocker

  • 字段详细资料

    • rid

      protected final StaticBuffer rid
      Uniquely identifies a process within a domain (or across all domains, though only intra-domain uniqueness is required)

    • times

      protected final TimestampProvider times
      Sole source of time. All fields of type long that represent times or durations should be expressed in terms of TimestampProvider.getUnit(). Furthermore, if the locking backend allows the client to set a timestamp on writes, those timestamps should be in the same units.

      Don't call System.currentTimeMillis() or System.nanoTime() directly. Use only this object. This object is replaced with a mock during testing to give tests exact control over the flow of time.

    • serializer

      protected final ConsistentKeyLockerSerializer serializer
      This is sort-of Cassandra/HBase specific. It concatenates KeyColumn arguments into a single StaticBuffer containing the key followed by the column and vice-versa.

    • llm

      protected final LocalLockMediator<StoreTransaction> llm
      Resolves lock contention by multiple threads.

    • lockState

      protected final LockerState<S extends LockStatus> lockState
      Stores all information about all locks this implementation has taken on behalf of any StoreTransaction. It is parameterized in a type specific to the concrete subclass, so that concrete implementations can store information specific to their locking primitives.

    • lockExpire

      protected final Duration lockExpire
      The amount of time, in times.getUnit(), that may pass after writing a lock before it is considered to be invalid and automatically unlocked.

    • log

      protected final org.slf4j.Logger log

  • 构造器详细资料

    • AbstractLocker

      public AbstractLocker​(StaticBuffer rid, TimestampProvider times, ConsistentKeyLockerSerializer serializer, LocalLockMediator<StoreTransaction> llm, LockerState<S> lockState, Duration lockExpire, org.slf4j.Logger log)

  • 方法详细资料

    • writeSingleLock

      protected abstract S writeSingleLock​(KeyColumn lockID, StoreTransaction tx) throws Throwable
      Try to take/acquire/write/claim a lock uniquely identified within this Locker by the lockID argument on behalf of tx.
      参数:
      lockID - identifies the lock
      tx - identifies the process claiming this lock
      返回:
      a LockStatus implementation on successful lock acquisition
      抛出:
      Throwable - if the lock could not be taken/acquired/written/claimed or the attempted write encountered an error

    • checkSingleLock

      protected abstract void checkSingleLock​(KeyColumn lockID, S lockStatus, StoreTransaction tx) throws Throwable
      Try to verify that the lock identified by lockID is already held by tx. The lockStatus argument refers to the object returned by a previous call to writeSingleLock(KeyColumn, StoreTransaction). This should be a read-only operation: return if the lock is already held, but this method finds that it is not held, then throw an exception instead of trying to acquire it.

      This method is only useful with nonblocking locking implementations try to lock and then check the outcome of the attempt in two separate stages. For implementations that build writeSingleLock(...) on a synchronous locking primitive, such as a blocking lock() method or a blocking semaphore p(), this method is redundant with writeSingleLock(...) and may unconditionally return true.

      参数:
      lockID - identifies the lock to check
      lockStatus - the result of a prior successful writeSingleLock(...) call on this lockID and tx
      tx - identifies the process claiming this lock
      抛出:
      Throwable - if the lock fails the check or if the attempted check encountered an error

    • deleteSingleLock

      protected abstract void deleteSingleLock​(KeyColumn lockID, S lockStatus, StoreTransaction tx) throws Throwable
      Try to unlock/release/delete the lock identified by lockID and both held by and verified for tx. This method is only called with arguments for which writeSingleLock(KeyColumn, StoreTransaction) and checkSingleLock(KeyColumn, LockStatus, StoreTransaction) both returned successfully (i.e. without exceptions).
      参数:
      lockID - identifies the lock to release
      lockStatus - the result of a prior successful writeSingleLock(...) followed by a successful checkSingleLock(...)
      tx - identifies the process that wrote and checked this lock
      抛出:
      Throwable - if the lock could not be released/deleted or if the attempted delete encountered an error

    • writeLock

      public void writeLock​(KeyColumn lockID, StoreTransaction tx) throws TemporaryLockingException, PermanentLockingException
      从接口复制的说明: Locker
      Attempt to acquire/take/claim/write the lock named by lockID.

      Returns on success and throws an exception on failure.

      指定者:
      writeLock 在接口中 Locker
      参数:
      lockID - the lock to acquire
      tx - the transaction attempting to acquire the lock
      抛出:
      TemporaryLockingException - a failure likely to disappear if the call is retried
      PermanentLockingException - a failure unlikely to disappear if the call is retried

    • checkLocks

      public void checkLocks​(StoreTransaction tx) throws TemporaryLockingException, PermanentLockingException
      从接口复制的说明: Locker
      Verify that all previous Locker.writeLock(KeyColumn, StoreTransaction) calls with tx actually succeeded.

      Returns on success and throws an exception on failure.

      指定者:
      checkLocks 在接口中 Locker
      参数:
      tx - the transaction attempting to check the result of previous writeLock(..., tx) calls in which it was the tx argument
      抛出:
      TemporaryLockingException - a failure likely to disappear if the call is retried
      PermanentLockingException - a failure unlikely to disappear if the call is retried

    • deleteLocks

      public void deleteLocks​(StoreTransaction tx) throws TemporaryLockingException, PermanentLockingException
      从接口复制的说明: Locker
      Release every lock currently held by tx.

      Returns on success and throws an exception on failure.

      指定者:
      deleteLocks 在接口中 Locker
      参数:
      tx - the transaction attempting to delete locks taken in previous writeLock(..., tx) calls in which it was the tx argument
      抛出:
      TemporaryLockingException - a failure likely to disappear if the call is retried
      PermanentLockingException - a failure unlikely to disappear if the call is retried
